title: Lost arm to tiger, Tiger King co-worker
itunes:title: Lost arm to tiger, Tiger King co-worker
description:
Hear the story of Kelci "Saff" Saffrey, who worked for Joe Exotic and in fact, lost an arm to a tiger. Saffrey confirms whether Joe Exotic executed tigers to make way for new ones and hear what he has to say about the grudge between Exotic and Carole Baskin.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
